author: andschwa
body:
This resolves #839.

@daxian-dbw and I aren't _super_ happy with some of the changes we've had to make here, and are hoping we get better solutions from the .NET Core team soon, but this is our proposed solution for now.

Note that this _all_ goes away when `GetAssemblies` comes back, per #733.

This is probably still a bit of a work-in-progress, Dongbo and I need to go back over it tomorrow.
